outline:
1. to bud, sprout, shoot, bloom
    1. (Qal) to bud, sprout, send out shoots, blossom
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to cause to bud or sprout
      2. to show buds or sprouts
    3. (Qal) to break out (of leprosy)
    4. (Qal) to fly
kjv_def: [idiom] abroad, [idiom] abundantly, blossom, break forth (out), bud, flourish, make fly, grow, spread, spring (up).
strongs_def: to break forth as a bud, i.e. bloom; generally, to spread; specifically, to fly (as extending the wings); figuratively, to flourish
